name: Whimel
storyline: Starting today, you are admitted to Whimel Magic Academy! Whimel Academy is a famous magic school where a variety of subjects are offered to the students. You will also meet fellow students, with whom you can develop friendships and potentially romance. Your only goal is to have a fulfilling student life and fruitful education during your six years here. You'll need to put aside time to earn some extra pocket money, all while balancing your classes, hobbies, and friendships.
summary: Whimel is a cozy academia time-management dating simulation game set in a magic school. Study magic, develop hobbies and fall in love in this wholesome and enchanting place.
